title: Spacious 2/BR; Close to Highways, T and Bus routes
posting_body: Sunny and spacious two bedroom, one bathroom apartment available starting September 1.
The apartment is on the 2nd floor of a two family house on a quiet side street.
3 Bus routes at the end of the street to Malden center station.
Easy access to the Orange line, Route 1, 99, 60 and 93.
Great for commuting into Boston or the Northshore.
- Large bedrooms, dining room, living room, pantry, plenty of storage, tons of windows and natural light, updated bathroom and kitchen.
- Newly renovated kitchen with new cabinets, counter-tops, dishwasher, garbage disposal, and porcelain tile flooring.
- Enclosed 3 season porches (front and back) for extra space.
First month and security deposit required.
Background, credit check, and income verification required.
Please leave your contact information, including phone number, and a brief description of your living situation to arrange a showing.
